alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 2:01PM EDT until June 28 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Luce County in eastern Upper Michigan... Northeastern Schoolcraft County in east central Upper Michigan... East central Alger County in north central Upper Michigan... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 201 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Grand Sable Dunes, or 11 miles south of Grand Marais, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Luce, northeastern Schoolcraft and east central Alger Counties, including the following locations... Nawakwa Lake and Snyder Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
